actions.name: Spider Lair

cost.trigger: At the start of combat or when the user is switched in.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat or when the user is switched in.
Effect: Connection - Sticky Web. The user freely uses Sticky Web. The user and allies are unaffected by the effect of Sticky Web created by the user.
